entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Saturday 07 January 2023
